```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

library(plotly)

```


```{r clean_data}

data("rest_inspec")

set.seed(1)

rest_inspec = 
  rest_inspec %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  mutate_all(tolower) %>%
  select(
    boro, cuisine_description, dba, inspection_date, inspection_type, critical_flag, score, grade) %>%
  drop_na(score) %>%
  sample_n(5000) 
  
#rest_inspec

```

```{r plot1}
#rest_inspec$score<-as.numeric(rest_inspec$score)
#summary(rest_inspec$score)
#typeof(rest_inspec$score)

  rest_inspec %>%
  mutate(score = as.numeric(score)) %>%
  filter(score >= 0) %>%
  mutate(boro = fct_reorder(boro, score)) %>%
  plot_ly(y = ~score, color = ~boro, type = "box",
          colors = "Set2")

```
